title: Connection error 2017.
body: Hello , I've downloaded lol client yesterday 21.1.2017 today i started the launcher , everything went fine until ... authentication successful , after Logging in and Boom...Connection error . I've visited support site and forums tried a couple of things also changing my email and password , nothing worked (hextechrepair tried that one as well ). Is there anyone else experiencing this ? Could someone explain and give me and advice of how to fix this issue . Thank you .

replies.body:
1) windows+R 
2) cmd -> ok
3) ENTER -> ipconfig/flushdns
4) ENTER

If the authetnical is successful then your login ability should be valid.  The issue seems to be more related to your network because it seems like you're reaching our authentication servers but getting cut off right after.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  guide to troubleshoot your connection.  This will help make sure that you're able to keep a constant connection when reaching our servers.  I hope that helps!
